EmailTemplate.description: New Email Template setup in June 2012
EmailTemplate.name: Workshop Postponed
EmailTemplate.subject: Workshop Postoned
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The International School of Moscow Part of The British Schools Group
Dear Parents,
Just a quick note to let you know that tomorrows seminar - Survival as a Trailing Spouse - has been postponed until after the half term break due to the Inspection taking place.
Confirmation of the new dates will be sent out via email as soon as possible.
Sorry for the inconveniences.
Kind regards,
Admissions Team The International School of Moscow World Class Education
__________________________________________________________ Member of The British School Group- University of Cambridge Examination Centre - Affiliate Member of the Conference of British International Schools - Licensed by the Russian Ministry of Education
